original_title: תיקו ן הלמד של הארי הקדוש
overview: Yossi Ashdot’s moving documentary takes us on a modern journey towards empowerment and spiritual understanding by following the fascinating and turbulent story of the Admor of Sitre Haim, who discovered the secrets of Kabbalah within the Holy Jewish Scriptures, in the 16th century.
title: Tikkun Ha-lamed of the Ha'ari Hakadosh
